title: By the King, a proclamation for the discovery and apprehension of the Earl of Bristol
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, this 25th day of August, 1663, in the fifteenth year of our reign."
Printed as a broadside, now in two leaves.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard Library.
